senses.sense_definition: Walking on the toes with the back of the foot raised off the ground, characteristic of animals like cats and dogs.

examples.text: Cats are <w>digitigrade</w> animals, which allows them to move quietly and quickly.
The <w>digitigrade</w> stance of the cheetah contributes to its incredible speed.

senses.sense_definition: An animal that walks on its toes rather than the soles of its feet.

examples.text: A dog is a <w>digitigrade</w>, while a bear is a plantigrade.
Most carnivores are <w>digitigrades</w> adapted for hunting.
